name: Breath of the Battlegrounds
description:
It's battle royale; you know the drill! 100 fighters in a desolate landscape must gather equipment and fight for survival against each other and the ever-growing wildfires that engulf the land. 

Controls:

WASD: movement
F: interact
L-SHiFT: sprint
L-CLICK: attack
R-CLICK: drop food
E: eat food
G/H: drop weapon/shield
T/Y: drop armour/helmet
M: toggle map
ESC: restart game
